InstalledItem.Name: Denning
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: WillsOp
Size: 0
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

With the Denning, you can now equip an award winning WillsOp radar to your vehicle.

InstalledItem.Name: LightBlossom
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Sakura Sun
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Featuring stylish design and strong performance, the LightBlossom is a worthy addition to Sakura Sun’s line-up, continuing the reputation the conglomerate has for making everything and making it well.

InstalledItem.Name: VariPuck S1 Gimbal Mount
InstalledItem.Description:
Manufacturer: Flashfire Systems
Item Type: Weapon Mount
Size: 1

The VariPuck fits between your weapon and the ship hardpoint to transform a fixed weapon mount into a gimballed mount, allowing the pilot to independently aim their weapon’s fire. This special VariPuck will accept any weapon the same size as the hardpoint it is mounting to.

InstalledItem.Name: Frost-Star
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: J-Span 
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Civilian

Noted for its consistent performance, the Frost-Star cooler from J-Span has many admirers for its well-balanced power to heat ratio.
